title: Many processes?
body: Is there any particular reason for there being 3 processes in my task manager for the new client? O.o

replies.body: They literally will tell you nothing about how crappy this client is cuz they want to make money with the new pretty one that causes your computer to commit suicide at the start of each game. Please, either fix or revert. I miss being able to actually play league as opposed to having the coolest client. Literally 4 processes for league and they take over a gig and a half to run on the cpu. Can't even listen to music while in game.
Well said. this is exactly my problem!!
We use Chromium Embedded Framework, which normally runs multiple processes. This is intentional behavior, nothing to worry about.

Ok, but this is lagging my PC out hard during games. I need a fix for this. There is no reason why LeagueClientHelperUx.exe *32 should be taking over 337,072 K on my pc and have yet another instance of LeagueClientHelperUx.exe *32 only taking 67,032 K.  I know for a fact there is something wrong here. My client has been misbehaving for years now!  There are also duplicates of LeagueClientUx.exe and LeagueClient.exe.  My game lags and sound cracks horribly during gameplay, during teamfights.

When ever these processes are running, in my case there are four, I get frequent FPs drops in game for no reason. If I close the four tasks ( they reopen automatically I believe) the FPS drops go away for the rest of the game.

I believe it is something in these processes that cause the FPs drops.
Hey i have a problem where i cant close the client from task manager. I hit exit but the client just pops right back up. Is this intended as well?
And this is why i can't play the game anymore :/
